full.subsectionText: In the heart of a bustling city, amidst the noise and chaos, stood a small, tranquil park. Its vibrant flowers and towering trees offered a sanctuary for those seeking solace. Children’s laughter echoed through the air, while elders reminisced on benches, creating a tapestry of life and serenity.

plainLanguage.subsectionText: In the busy city, there was a little park. It had pretty flowers and big trees. People liked to come and play. Kids laughed and ran around. Old people sat on benches and talked. It was a happy, quiet place where everyone smiled.
